title: Eat Here - SCE | Student Centers | University of Illinois at Chicago

Halsted St.  Are you hungry and looking for a nice restaurant to enjoy good cuisine? Whether you are looking to dine-in or something on the go, the Student Centers has several options for you to choose from. We also offer catering for special events, or just because.       605 Commons      Designed to meet the nutritional needs and the environmental expectations of University students, faculty, staff and visitors.  1st Floor  Menu  Regular Hours   Monday-Thursday 7:30am – 3:00pm – Breakfast/Lunch 4:30pm – 8:00pm – Dinner 9:00pm – 12:00am – Late Night  Friday  7:30am-3:00pm – Breakfast/Lunch 4:30pm-8:00pm – Dinner  Saturday 9:30am-2:00pm – Brunch 4:30pm-8:00pm – Dinner  Sunday 9:30am-2:00pm – Brunch 4:30pm-8:00pm – Dinner 9:00pm-12:00am – Late Night  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 3/20/20 Monday – Friday 9:00am-2:00pm – Brunch 5:00pm-8:00 pm – Dinner  3/21/20 – 3/22/20 Saturday & Sunday Closed  3/23/20 – 3/29/20 Monday – Friday 12:00pm-1:30pm – Lunch (to go only) 4:00pm-5:30 pm – Dinner (to go only)              3/27/20 – 4/6/20 Monday – Friday 11:00am-1:30pm – Lunch 4:00pm-5:30 pm – Dinner  Saturday – Sunday 10:00am-12:00pm – Brunch Dinner (to go only, pick up after Brunch )  Resume Regular Hours TBA                        Argo Tea      Argo Tea primarily sells a variety of hot and cold tea-based signature drinks. In addition, it offers about three dozen international varieties of loose-leaf tea, coffee, baked goods, small entrées, and teaware.  2nd Floor  On-line order and Menu  Regular Hours  Monday-Friday 7:00am-6:00pm   Saturday-Sunday Closed Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 4/6/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours TBA        Circle Burger      2nd Floor Inner Circle  On-line order and Menu  Regular Hours   Monday-Thursday 10:00am-7:00pm  Friday 10:00am-4:00pm  Saturday & Sunday Closed  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 Monday 10:00am – 4:00pm  3/17/20 – 4/6/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours TBA        Molly's Cupcakes      We bake our cupcakes from scratch in small batches everyday and throughout the day. That way, we can make sure every cupcake comes out just right. And we use only the finest and freshest ingredients.  1st Floor Concourse Halsted Street Side  Regular Hours  Opening TBA        Chick-fil-A      Chick-fil-A is a quick-service chicken restaurant chain in the United States. Its products include chicken sandwiches, salads, additional entrees, and side dishes.  1st Floor  On-line order and Menu  Regular Hours   Monday-Thursday 7:00am-10:30pm  Friday 7:00am – 7:00pm  Saturday 7:30am – 7:00pm  Sunday Closed  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 3/20/20 Monday – Friday 9:00am – 4:00pm Saturday – Sunday Closed  3/21/20 – 4/6/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours TBA        Dunkin' Donuts/Baskin-Robbins      Dunkin’ Donuts is the world’s leading baked goods and coffee chain, serving more than 3 million customers each and every day. True to our name, we offer 50 varieties of donuts, but you can also enjoy dozens of premium beverages, bagels, breakfast sandwiches and other baked goods. Baskin-Robbins is the world’s largest chain of ice cream specialty shops, providing guests with a wide array of ice cream flavors and delicious treats  2nd Floor  On-line order and Menu  Regular Hours   Monday-Friday 6:30am-10:00pm  Saturday – Sunday 7:00am-6:00pm  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 3/20/20 Monday – Sunday 8:00am – 6:00pm  3/21/20 – 4/6/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours TBA        Market @ Halsted      2nd Floor  Regular Hours   Monday-Friday 7:00am-11:00pm  Saturday & Sunday 9:00am – 5:00pm  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 3/25/20 Monday – Sunday 10:00am – 8:00pm        3/26/20 – 4/6/20 Monday – Friday 10:00am – 5:00pm Saturday – Sunday Closed        Resume Regular Hours TBA        Panda Express      1st Floor  On-line order and Menu  Regular Hours   Monday-Friday 10:30am-7:00pm  Saturday Closed  Sunday 11:00am – 3:00pm  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 4/6/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours TBA        Moe's Southwest Grill      Moe’s offers various types of food on its menu. Burritos, tacos, quesadillas, nachos, salads, stacks, burrito bowls, and salsas with more than twenty ingredients are available to customers to create their own unique meal. These entrees have specific ingredients within it, but ingredients can be added or subtracted from it as the customer customizes their entree. Every order comes with chips and salsa on the side.  2nd Floor Inner Circle  On-line order and Menu  Regular Hours   Monday-Friday 7:00am-9:00pm  Saturday – Sunday Closed  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 3/19/20 Monday – Thursday 11:00am – 2:00pm Friday – Sunday Closed  3/20/20 – 4/6/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours TBA            Sbarro      2nd Floor Inner Circle  On-line order and Menu  Regular Hours   Monday-Thursday 10:00am-8:00pm  Friday 10:00am-4:00pm  Saturday & Sunday Closed  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 Monday 10:00am – 4:00pm  3/17/20 – 4/6/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours TBA Monday – Friday        Subway      2nd Floor Inner Circle  On-line order and Men u  Regular Hours   Monday-Thursday 7:00am – 9:00pm  Friday 7:00am – 6:00pm  Saturday & Sunday Closed  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 3/19/20 Monday – Thursday 8:00am – 6:00pm Friday – Sunday Closed  3/20/20 – 4/6/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours TBA           Dining           Student Center East    Student Center West    Student Services Building    Alternate Campus Dining
